data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 1, Ado Onaiwu for Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Urawa at Nissan Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
In the minute 2, Goal! Junior Santos gives Yokohama Marinos a 1-0 lead in Yokohama.
Kota Mizunuma instrumental with a fine assist.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Urawa a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Urawa.
At Nissan Stadium, Urawa are penalized for being offside.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
In the minute 10, Goal! Daizen Maeda extends Yokohama Marinos lead to 2-0 with a header.
Kota Mizunuma with an assist there.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 14, Yokohama Marinos take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Ryuta Koike.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Yokohama Marinos are pushing forward but Junior Santos's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 20, In Yokohama Yokohama Marinos attack through Daizen Maeda. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Urawa.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in Urawa.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
In the minute 29, Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Urawa's half.
Urawa have a goal kick.
In the minute 31, It's now 3-1 thanks to an own goal from Makito Ito.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 34, Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Urawa in Yokohama.
In the minute 35, Tomoya Ugajin (Urawa) gets a yellow card.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Koichiro Fukushima awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 36, Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
In the minute 37, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal! Yokohama Marinos extend their lead to 4-1 through Junior Santos.
Great play from Kota Mizunuma to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Urawa.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 44, Koichiro Fukushima awards Urawa a goal kick.
Throw-in for Urawa at Nissan Stadium.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Yokohama.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Eitaro Matsuda is on a sub for Daizen Maeda for Yokohama Marinos.
Urawa make their first substitution with Takuya Aoki replacing Ewerton.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Tomoya Ugajin with Ryosuke Yamanaka.
Yokohama Marinos's Ryuta Koike breaks free at Nissan Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Urawa at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 53, Yokohama Marinos's Junior Santos breaks free at Nissan Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Urawa have a goal kick.
Shinzo Koroki for Urawa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 54, Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
Urawa have a goal kick.
Leonardo is replacing Yuki Muto for the away team.
In the minute 57, Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Leonardo for Urawa drives towards goal at Nissan Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Yokohama Marinos push forward at Nissan Stadium and Ado Onaiwu gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Urawa defence.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
In the minute 58, Ange Postecoglou is making the team's second substitution at Nissan Stadium with Ryo Takano replacing Theerathon Bunmathan.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Urawa's half.
In the minute 60, Throw-in Urawa.
Free kick Urawa.
Yokohama Marinos's Ado Onaiwu gets in a shot on goal at Nissan Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 67, Goal! Kota Mizunuma extends Yokohama Marinos's lead to 5-1.
That's a fine assist from Ado Onaiwu.
Can Yokohama Marinos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Urawa's half?
In the minute 70, Urawa's Koya Yuruki gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Ado Onaiwu gets his shot on target but fails to score for Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Throw-in for Urawa in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Ange Postecoglou (Yokohama Marinos) is making a third substitution, with Yuki Otsu replacing Ado Onaiwu.
In the minute 74, Teruhito Nakagawa is replacing Kota Mizunuma for the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
In Yokohama, Ryuta Koike of Yokohama Marinos is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Urawa a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Yokohama Marinos drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a throw-in for Yokohama Marinos, close to Urawa's area.
The away team have replaced Shinzo Koroki with Kenyu Sugimoto. This is the fourth substitution made today by Tsuyoshi Otsuki.
In the minute 80, Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Yokohama Marinos's Yuki Otsu misses with an attempt on goal.
Urawa have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Junior Santos (Yokohama Marinos) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Urawa have a dangerous throw-in.
Yokohama Marinos needs to be cautious. Urawa have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 84, Kota Watanabe is replacing Takuya Wada for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Can Urawa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Urawa a goal kick.
In Yokohama Urawa drive forward through Kenyu Sugimoto. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
In the minute 87, The away team replace Koya Yuruki with Kosuke Taketomi.
Koichiro Fukushima awards the home team a throw-in.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Yokohama.
Takuya Aoki gets his shot on target but fails to score for Urawa.
Corner awarded to Urawa.
Takuya Aoki (Urawa) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
The second-half is over. The match ends 6-2.
Goal! Quenten Martinus pulls one back for Urawa to make it 5-2.
Ryosuke Yamanaka instrumental with a fine assist.
Junior Santos puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 6-2.
Great play from Eitaro Matsuda to set up the goal.
